data.title: 🎃VirginiaHauntedHouses.com Halloween Weekend Guide: October 26-29th 👻
data.meta_description: Halloween is just two days away and there is endless entertainment taking place all weekend long to celebrate. From the Haunted Houses and spooky trails to Zombie Shootouts and virtual experiences that can be enjoyed from home, https://www.
data.text:
Charlottesville Ghosts

Charlottesville, VA

Charlottesville Ghosts Embark on an otherworldly adventure with Charlottesville Ghosts and uncover the spine-tingling hauntings that the Blue Ridge Mountains conceal. Haunted Nightmares

Winchester, VA

Haunted Nightmares is an intense, high energy haunted attraction that uses the latest technology available to the haunt industry. Richmond Ghosts

Richmond, VA

Richmond Ghost Tour - Unearthing Echoes of Eternity Peel back the layers of time and uncover tales of murder, mayhem, and tragedy, all while immersing yourself in the secret histories concealed in Richmond's shadows. The Death Trail

Dumfries, VA

The only haunted attraction in Prince William County, the Death Trail offers the best scream around. Experience the dark woods filled with demented clowns, terrifying zombies, the insane and much more. Terror Woods

Chesapeake, VA

Our Haunted walk thru lasts 13-14 Minutes of Terror Woods trail filled with actors and actomotronics. Very scary and spooky. Miller's Nightmare Haunted Farm

Lewisburg, WV

First, you can enjoy our Midway while you wait. We offer food, games, fire, music, and a Nightmare Parade at dusk! From here, you will enter the attraction. Alexandria Ghosts

Alexandria, VA

Alexandria Ghosts Step into the realm of Alexandria Ghosts Tours and awaken the specters of war, tragedy, and murder that linger in Old Town Alexandria's historic streets. Hartman's Haunted Corn Maze & Zombie Paintball Hunting

Mosheim, TN

Our corn maze is 8 acres and has approximately 3 1/2 miles of trail in it. There are many twists and turns and numerous chances to get lost. Lake Hickory Haunts

Hickory, NC

Voted the best haunt in the Carolina's, Lake Hickory Haunts is a one of a kind haunted house attraction; featuring a large body of water, surrounded by 13 unique haunted attractions. Lynchburg Ghosts

Lynchburg, VA

Lynchburg Ghosts Welcome to Lynchburg's most captivating ghost tour, where history and the supernatural converge to create an unforgettable experience. Haunted Woods of Hoover Ridge

Madison, VA

Come walk over a quarter mile twisted trail of terror if you dare. Go through tunnels and wooded trails where over 50 monsters are lurking. Hexed Haunted Attraction

Elliston, VA

Come Visit Hexed, If You Dare UNHINGED… UNFILTERED… AND IT CANNOT BE UNSEEN. COME EXPERIENCE THE TWISTED SIGHTS AND LIVING NIGHTMARES OF SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA’S MOST EXCITING HAUNTED ATTRACTION. Neptune Ghosts

Virginia Beach, VA

Neptune Ghosts Welcome to Virginia Beach's Eerie Enigma, the #1 rated ghost tour that dares you to uncover the spine-tingling horrors lurking beneath the Virginia Beach boardwalk. Terror Manor

Roanoke, VA

Terror manor is Roanoke’s first ADA Commercial Haunted House featuring Over 40+rooms of pure terror! Terror Manor is a full immersion haunt featuring high props, animatronics, scent canisters, sound and water. Blue Ridge Nightmares

Roanoke, VA

Prepare to be scared! Center in the Square is bringing Hollywood level quality in Halloween-themed entertainment to Roanoke with their own haunted attraction, “Blue Ridge Nightmares Utilizing a massive warehouse space at the Roanoke Industrial Center just outside of Downtown Roanoke at 1910 9th Stree The Warehouse

Weber City, VA

The Warehouse presents, 'Psychosis' Where ones thoughts and emotions are so affected by their surroundings that all contact is lost with reality. American Fright Night

Quicksburg, VA

Your deepest fears come to life in this 40,000 square foot attraction! Hosted in a Parade Float museum guests will find towering figures and creatures above them while walking through themed areas such as Clown Town, Creepy Christmas, Patriotic Chaos, Jungle, Graveyard and a twisting and winding Haun Workhouse Haunt - Game Over

Lorton, VA

Trick or Treat. The Choice is Yours. Are You Game Enough to Play? The Workhouse Arts Center celebrates our 10th annual Haunted Trail by bringing scares and laughs to the Halloween season. St Albans Sanatorium Slayhoue II Crazed Circus

Radford, VA

In 2011 we entered the Asylum. In 2012 there was Reign of Terrors and Carnival of Cadavers. In 2013 our Fairytales became Nightmares. Norfolk Haunted Temple

Norfolk, VA

The Norfolk haunted temple is celebrating its 13th year as the most horrifying place in Hampton Roads! To commemorate our midnight anniversary, all of the dials will be turned up to twelve! Granville Haunt Farm

Oxford, NC

Our Drive-Through Drive-In returns! Drive through our giant movie screen and watch your favorite horror movies come to life on the other side, all while staying safe in your vehicle the entire time! Pappy's Haunted Trails

Lacrosse, VA

FEATURE TRAIL The featured trail spans 0.4 of a mile and consists of various sections. The realistic part includes elements like snakes and spiders, which tend to evoke fear in most individuals. Woods of Terror

Greensboro, NC

Haunted Hunt Club Farm

Virginia Beach, VA

Let the fright nights begin! Bring the whole family for an unforgettable night at our Haunted Hunt Club Farm Halloween Festival of terrifying attractions, creepy characters, and ghastly ghouls! Colonial Ghosts

Williamsburg, VA

Colonial Ghosts Tour - Williamsburg: Where Whispers and Wonders Converge Step into the enigmatic world of Williamsburg, VA, where history's echoes intertwine with haunted secrets, crafting a tapestry of tales both captivating and haunting. Spooky Acres Haunted House

Portsmouth, VA

Come celebrate 25 years of haunting with the March of Dimes annual Spooky Acres Haunted House. We are now located at 2850 Airline Blvd Portsmouth, Va 23701. Haunts of Richmond

Richmond, VA

Located in the heart of Richmond's oldest and most haunted neighborhoods, Haunts of Richmond brings local ghost stories and legends to life. Landstown Horror

Virginia Beach, VA

Fellow Fiends and Ghouls! Once again, we present to you LANDSTOWN HORROR! Come join us October 20th, 21st, 27th, and 28th 7:30pm – 10:00pm for a night of terror! Mulberry Hills Farm Pumpkin Patch

Mount Crawford, VA

Mulberry Hills Pumpkin Patch is gearing up this fall! The Farm is a family ran Business producing Angus Beef Cattle Various varieties of Pumpkins & Gourds Soybeans, Wheat and Field Corn (Keep scrolling to see all the happings at the farm! Jeter Farm Fall Festival

Roanoke, VA

If you are young or just young at heart you will enjoy getting lost in the corn maze, visiting the farm animals, or playing in the barnyard. Smith's Pumpkin Patch

Lynchburg, VA

Located in Lynchburg, VA we bring a fun, clean and safe environment for you and your family, come enjoy the fall weather, large inflatables pumpkin painting and much more. Pumpkin Patch at Ruffin Mill

Colonial Heights, VA

Jump on the FREE Wagon Ride behind the Farm Tractor & Ride around our fields. Last wagon pulls out from the barn 30 minutes before closing. Shockley Farms Corn Maze and Pumpkin Patch

Cape Charles, VA

Our Corn Maze and Pumpkin Patch will be open on entire fall season. Happy Fall! We currently have Pumpkins, Gourds, eggplant, squash, and tomatoes! Ghost & Graveyard Tours - Alexandria Colonial Tours

Alexandria, VA

You’ll follow an 18th century costumed guide by lantern light through the charming streets of Alexandria’s historic district known as Old Town. Belvedere Plantation Fall Harvest Festival

Fredericksburg, VA

While the Maize Maze and Pumpkin Patch are primary attractions at Belvedere Plantation, there are lots of activities and events to make your visit really exciting. Doe Run Farm

Ararat, VA

Doe Run Farm lies in the valley of the Blue Ridge Mountains of Ararat, Virginia. During May the farm has strawberry patch, June brings forth fresh broccoli, while the warm sun in July brings fresh green cabbage. VB HOUSE OF TORMENT

Virginia Beach, VA

Welcome to the VB HOUSE OF TORMENT 2023 Haunted Yard . We are a Home Haunt. We use old school scares with a new school twist. Creepy Hollow Scream Park

Glen Allen, VA

Creepy Hollow Scream Park is Richmond's Ultimate Halloween destination, with more monsters, more frights and more fun! Each night we have well over 40 live actors monsters, incredible animatronics, amazing illusions and acres of screams. Lloyd Family Farms Pumpkin Patch

Rockville, VA

Lloyd Family Farms Pumpkin Patch offers hours of family fun. We offer hay rides around the farm, a corn maze , barnyard friends meet and great, a corn crib for the kids to play in, and a 50+ acre pumpkin patch. Pumpkinville Pumpkin Patch

Toano, VA

Pumpkinville is a fun, seasonal treasure located in Toano, Va. and is owned and operated by a small family farm in nearby Barhamsville, Va. Drumheller's Orchard

Lovingston, VA

This is where the fun comes in! We have a wide range of activities for all ages, such as hayrides to the pumpkin patch and corn maze, an apple sling shot, and kids zone. Miller Farms Market Pumpkin Patch

Locust Grove, VA

Come enjoy old fashioned pumpkin picking, where all you pay for is the pumpkin. Explore our 17 acres of pumpkins, gourds, mini pumpkins, and winter squash in search of the perfect pumpkin. Nightmare On Church Street

Keysville, VA

The Keysville Volunteer Fire Department opened Nightmare on Church Street. This is the scariest haunted attraction in Southside VA. Owen Farm Tours

Danville, VA

Join us on one of our exciting old-fashion hayrides as we visit with all the farm animals and take a scenic ride over the entire farm. Windy Knoll Farm Pumpkin Patch

Mechanicsville, VA

Pumpkin seeds are ordered in the early part of the year; this ensures that we are able to get just the right variety of seeds for our pumpkins. Spooktacular Halloween Party

Virginia Beach, VA

The perfect place for all – young and young-at-heart! Spooktacular Halloween party - all ages are welcome!! Please bring an appetizer to share Pizza, drinks and desserts provided. Yankey Farms Pumpkin Patch

Nokesville, VA

You can come out and pick the perfect pumpkin, get lost in our corn maze scavenger hunt, ride around the farm on the cow train, and play in our fun farmyard activity area. Halloween Glow in the Park

Virginia Beach, VA

Join us on October for a spooky night in the trees for all ages 5 & up! The Adventure Park will be adorned with Halloween decorations & you may have the opportunity for a BUG TASTING. Liberty Mills Farm Corn Maze

Somerset, VA

Your maze ticket allows you to complete one or all four maze trails, the hay wagon ride and activity area. Maze times are approximate as it depends on your strategy, sense of adventure and size of your group! Halloween Costume Party at American Legion Post 364

Woodbridge, VA

After Comedy night with Mark Matusof, stick around for the Post's annual Adult Halloween Party! Prizes for best costumes; Wicked Jezabel for the entertainment; snacks will be provided, however it is asked for attendees to bring covered dish item to share. Haunted Hunt Club Farm

Virginia Beach, VA

Let the fright nights begin! Bring the whole family for an unforgettable night at our Haunted Hunt Club Farm Halloween Festival of terrifying attractions, creepy characters, and ghastly ghouls! Church Hill Chillers Ghost Tour

Richmond, VA

Tour includes stops at Crazy Bet's stomping grounds, Poe's first and last love, and the oldest public cemetery in Richmond. Burke Nursery and Garden Centre

Burke, VA

Our fall festival activities are designed to be both fun and educational for all. These include Pumpkin Patches,Hayrides, Pumpkin Fort, Face Painting, Pony Rides, Farm Animals, Ghost Tunnel Slide, Western Town - includes mechanical rides, Money Montain - hunt for coins and treasures, & many more! Round Hill Farm

Culpeper, VA

With the arrival of cool weather, apple festivals, pumpkin patches and the turning of the leaves, comes a new season of family fun…Fall! Halloween Spooktacular

Virginia Beach, VA

PB&J Family Concert Series presents Halloween Spooktacular! Perfect for ages 3-12! Dress up in your favorite Halloween costume and join Benjamin Rous and the Virginia Symphony Orchestra for a ghoulish afternoon of monstrous fun! Belmont Pumpkin Farm

North, VA

Come join us for some old fashioned fall harvest fun! Pick your own pumpkins, hayrides, corn maze, scarecrow making, pumpkin painting, great pumpkin desserts and bbq. Mt. Olympus Farm PYO Pumpkins

Ruther Glen, VA

Mount Olympus Farm is a family owned farm located between Richmond and Fredericksburg, VA. You can pick-your-own (PYO) Pumpkins at Fall season. Shadows of Shockoe

Richmond, VA

Explore the dark side of Virginia's capital city and hear its ghostly and ghastly tales! Shadows of Shockoe: A fascinating nighttime exploration of Shockoe Bottom, the oldest and most haunted neighborhood in Richmond. The Dark Woods Haunted Trail

Radford, VA

A Terrifying, Self Guided Trek through the Woods. Starting through the Spooky Haunted House , Deserted Mine Shaft, Mazes, Medieval Torture Chamber, Carnival Tent, and much more . Monet Haunt

Virginia Beach, VA

Monet Haunt 2022 Roll up, roll up this Halloween For the gravest show on earth There's ever been With curios, the macabre to thrill and delight The big top is open. Krop's Crops Pumpkin Patch and Hayride

Great Falls, VA

Take our tractor hayride out to the pumpkin patch and pick the perfect pumpkin to carve up or decorate! We sell pumpkins of all sizes - tiny and outrageously huge! Sinkland Farms Pumpkin Festival

Christiansburg, VA

The Pumpkin Festival is known as “a family tradition” and offers many family-friendly attractions for the young and young at heart, including hayrides to the pumpkin fields to pick your own “great pumpkin,” a brain-twisting corn maze, farmyard animals and fantastic live music on two great stages. Halloween Town & Treat

Virginia Beach, VA

Town Center of Virginia Beach invites you to come dressed in your best costume for our annual “Town and Treat” event! Stop by for free trick-or-treating at Town Center businesses, activity stations, roaming characters, games, music, cotton candy, costume contests, and more! Fun on the Farm at Hanover Vegetable Farm

Ashland, VA

Fall attractions include a hayride, pumpkin picking, one pumpkin per person, corn maze, bounce house and blow up obstacle course, animal viewing, corn pits! Swift Creek Pumpkin Patch

Moseley, VA

We carry a large assortment of pumpkins. From pie pumpkins to carving pumpkins, we'll have something for everyone. We have a straw maze, corn hole, pumpkin painting and various games for kids to play. Crow's Nest Greenhouses

Blacksburg, VA

Fall is the time of year when everything seems to slow down. Here at the Greenhouses though, we are busy growing beautiful mums, pansies and ornamental cabbages & kale to add color to your fall garden, to brighten up your porch or deck or provide unique arrangements for holiday tables. Darden's Country Store

Smithfield, VA

Every year, hundreds of children, with their parents and teachers, visit to pick crops from the farm and then learn how they are used in everyday products. Wood's Orchard PYO Pumpkins

Hampton, VA

For the past 4 years we have offered pick your own pumpkins complete with hay rides into each of our patches. We have a wide array of different size pumpkins available for picking. Crab Orchard Corn Maze & Pisgah Pumpkin Patch

Tazewell, VA

Fall is here and it’s time to start decorating! Come by and pick out all your pumpkins and gourds from the fantastic varieties grown in the Pisgah Pumpkin Patch! Holly Fork Farm Produce & Pumpkin Patch

Barhamsville, VA

Did you know we offer U - Pick pumpkins in October!!! Come have a great farm experience! (We have pre-picked too) We also have fall decor, gourds, dried gourds, carving kits, sweet potatoes, butternuts, homemade jams too! Eerie Nights Ghost Tours

Richmond, VA

Eerie Nights walking tour involves walking for a period of up to an hour and a half; participants should be in good health and we recommend comfortable shoes. Sarah's Pumpkin Patch

Orange, VA

Welcome to Sarah's Pumpkin Patch! Pick-Your-Own Pumpkin patch in southeastern Madison County, Virginia that is located on a working family farm. Wayside Farm Fun Corn Maze & Pumpkin Patch

Berryville, VA

Get lost in our 10-acre corn maze. Use your sleuth skills to navigate your way through our football-themed maze. Pumpkins of every shape, color and size are plentiful in our 8-acre u-pick pumpkin field.
